snippet: The signature of President Hugo Chávez appeared on a government decree this week though Mr. Chávez has not been seen or heard from since undergoing cancer surgery in Cuba in December.
abstract: Signature of Venezuelan Pres Hugo Chavez appears on government decree though he has not been seen or heard from since undergoing cancer surgery in Cuba in December; doubters press for inspection of decree by handwriting experts to determine authenticity.
lead_paragraph: The signature of President Hugo Chávez appeared on a government decree this week though Mr. Chávez has not been seen or heard from since undergoing cancer surgery in Cuba in December.

headline.seo: Appearance of Chávez’s Signature Riles Critics
headline.main: Critics Question Chávez Signature on an Official Decree
headline.print_headline: Critics Question Chávez Signature on an Official Decree
